DOC.brief_title: Objective Structured Assessment Technical Skills ( OSATS ) Evaluation Delivery Vacuum Extraction
DOC.detailed_description: The optimal mode Training surgical novice perform assist delivery mean vacuum extraction unknown . We prospectively randomize probands 30 min hands-on ( group 1 ) 30 min demonstration ( group 2 ) training session teach standardized vacuum Extraction ( VE ) algorithm scheme pelvic training model . Probands test 24 item Objective Structured Assessment Technical Skills ( OSATS ) score system train 48 hour , 72 hour thereafter . OSATS score primary outcome . Performance time ( PT ) , self assessment ( SA ) , confidence ( CON ) , global rating scale ( GRS ) secondary outcome . Statistics beperformed use Mann-Whitney U-test , chi-square test , multivariable logistic regression analysis .
